languages.text: "Ты не веришь в Инцендию. Ты и в Императора-то не веришь. Верой ты лишь прикрываешь страх гибели, Иеронимус".
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
languages.original_text: "Ты не веришь в Инцендию. Ты и в Императора-то не веришь. Верой ты лишь прикрываешь страх гибели, Иеронимус".

traits.locale_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or indeed in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or indeed in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or indeed in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or indeed in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."
"You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

languages.text: “你既不相信因森蒂娅，也不相信帝皇。你的信仰不过是个幌子，源于你对死亡的恐惧，希罗尼穆斯。”
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: “你既不相信因森蒂娅，也不相信帝皇。你的信仰不过是个幌子，源于你对死亡的恐惧，希罗尼穆斯。”

languages.text: 「お前はインセンディアを信用していない。皇帝さえもだ。ヒエロニムス、お前の信念は、死への恐怖のための単なる煙幕にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はインセンディアを信用していない。皇帝さえもだ。ヒエロニムス、お前の信念は、死への恐怖のための単なる煙幕にすぎない」

languages.text: «No cree en Incendia ni en el Emperador. Hieronymus, su fe no es más que una cortina de humo para su miedo a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: «No cree en Incendia ni en el Emperador. Hieronymus, su fe no es más que una cortina de humo para su miedo a la muerte."

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt nicht an Incendia. Oder an den Imperator. Euer Glaube ist eine bloße Tarnung für Eure Angst vor dem Tod, Hieronymus."
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt nicht an Incendia. Oder an den Imperator. Euer Glaube ist eine bloße Tarnung für Eure Angst vor dem Tod, Hieronymus."

languages.text: « Vous ne croyez ni en Incendia, ni même en l'Empereur. Votre foi vous sert d'écran de fumée pour masquer votre peur de mourir, Hiéronymus. »
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne croyez pas en Incendia, ni même en l'Empereur. Votre foi vous sert d'écran de fumée pour masquer votre peur de mourir, Hiéronymus. »

languages.text: "İncendia'ya inanmıyorsun. İmparator'a da inanmıyorsun. İnancın, içindeki ölüm korkusu için bir paravandan ibaret Hieronymus."
languages.original_text: "You do not believe in Incendia. Or in the Emperor. Your faith is a mere smokescreen for your fear of death, Hieronymus."

traits.locale_text: "İncendia'ya inanmıyorsun. İmparator'a da inanmıyorsun. İnancın yalnızca içindeki ölüm korkusu için bir paravan Hieronymus."
